solution_line_template: Marco gets {total_ounces_in_box} / {ounces_per_cup_fraction} = {total_ounces_in_box} * {reciprocal_of_ounces_per_cup} = <<{total_ounces_in_box}*{reciprocal_of_ounces_per_cup}={total_cups_from_box}>>{total_cups_from_box} cups of tea from a box.
At {days_per_week} days a week, Marco gets {total_cups_from_box} / {days_per_week} = <<{total_cups_from_box}/{days_per_week}={weeks_of_tea}>>{weeks_of_tea} weeks of daily tea from a box.
